languages.text: {n}Смешавшись, техножрец погружается в раздумия, а затем без особой уверенности отвечает:{/n} "Утверждение ложно. Каждая гипотеза была выведена логически из ситуации, в которой мы находимся".
{n}The Tech-Priest is taken aback. He pauses to think, then says with no great confidence,{/n} "This statement is false. Each of the hypotheses was logically deduced from our present situation."
languages.original_text: {n}Смешавшись, техножрец погружается в раздумия, а затем без особой уверенности отвечает:{/n} "Утверждение ложно. Каждая гипотеза была выведена логически из ситуации, в которой мы находимся".

languages.text: {n}技術司祭は呆気にとられている。黙って考え込んでから、あまり自信なさげに話しはじめた。{/n}「この声明は誤りです。それぞれの仮説は自分たちの現状から論理的に推論されたものだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is taken aback. He pauses to think, then says with no great confidence,{/n} "This statement is false. Each of the hypotheses was logically deduced from our present situation."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭は呆気にとられている。黙って考え込んでから、あまり自信なさげに話しはじめた。{/n}「この声明は誤りです。それぞれの仮説は自分たちの現状から論理的に推論されたものだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡吃了一惊。他停了下来，思考了一会，然后不太自信地说着。{/n}“这个说法是错误的。每个假设都是根据我们目前的情况，凭借逻辑推导出来的答案。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is taken aback. He pauses to think, then says with no great confidence,{/n} "This statement is false. Each of the hypotheses was logically deduced from our present situation."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡吃了一惊。他停了下来，思考了一会，然后不太自信地说着。{/n}“这个说法是错误的。每个假设都是根据我们目前的情况，凭借逻辑推导出来的答案。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pris de court, le technoprêtre se donne le temps de la réflexion avant d'ajouter, l'air confiant :{/n} « Déclaration erronée. Chacune des hypothèses énoncées est le produit d'un raisonnement logique lié à notre situation actuelle. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is taken aback. He pauses to think, then says with no great confidence,{/n} "This statement is false. Each of the hypotheses was logically deduced from our present situation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pris de court, le technoprêtre se donne le temps de la réflexion avant d'ajouter, l'air confiant :{/n} « Déclaration erronée. Chacune des hypothèses énoncées est le produit d'un raisonnement logique lié à notre situation actuelle. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote se queda sorprendido. Realiza una pausa para pensar y luego dice con no demasiada confianza:{/n} «Esta declaración es falsa. Todas las hipótesis se han deducido de forma lógica basándose en nuestra situación actual».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is taken aback. He pauses to think, then says with no great confidence,{/n} "This statement is false. Each of the hypotheses was logically deduced from our present situation."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote se queda sorprendido. Realiza una pausa para pensar y luego dice con no demasiada confianza:{/n} «Esta declaración es falsa. Todas las hipótesis se han deducido de forma lógica basándose en nuestra situación actual».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester ist erstaunt. Er denkt kurz nach, dann sagt er ohne große Überzeugung:{/n} "Diese Aussage ist falsch. Jede dieser Hypothesen wurde aus unserer aktuellen Situation logisch abgeleitet."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is taken aback. He pauses to think, then says with no great confidence,{/n} "This statement is false. Each of the hypotheses was logically deduced from our present situation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester ist erstaunt. Er denkt kurz nach, dann sagt er ohne große Überzeugung:{/n} "Diese Aussage ist falsch. Jede dieser Hypothesen wurde aus unserer aktuellen Situation logisch abgeleitet."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip irkiliyor. Bir süre durup düşünüyor, ardından büyük bir öz güvenle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bu önerme yanlış. Her bir hipotez, mevcut durumumuz baz alınarak ve mantıksal çıkarımlar yapılarak ortaya konmaktadır."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest is taken aback. He pauses to think, then says with no great confidence,{/n} "This statement is false. Each of the hypotheses was logically deduced from our present situation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip irkiliyor. Bir süre durup düşünüyor, ardından büyük bir öz güvenle konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Bu önerme yanlış. Her bir hipotez, mevcut durumumuz baz alınarak ve mantıksal çıkarımlar yapılarak geliştirilmiştir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
